languages.text: {n}Взгляд Ирлиэт темнеет.{/n} "К чему этот вопрос? Праздное любопытство? Или нечто иное? Не обращай свои мысли к {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Сай'лантреш{/g}, что бы тобой ни двигало! Она — погибель. Она — голод. Она — враг всего благого, что есть во вселенной. Она враг {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарам{/g}. И тебе — надеюсь — тоже". {n}Последнюю фразу Ирлиэт произносит с нажимом, испытующе глядя на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Взгляд Ирлиэт темнеет.{/n} "К чему этот вопрос? Праздное любопытство? Или нечто иное? Не обращай свои мысли к {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Сай'лантреш{/g}, что бы тобой ни двигало! Она — погибель. Она — голод. Она — враг всего благого, что есть во вселенной. Она враг {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарам{/g}. И тебе — надеюсь — тоже". {n}Последнюю фразу Ирлиэт произносит с нажимом, испытующе глядя на вас.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow dark.{/n} "Why ask this question? Is it idle curiosity, or something else? Do not turn your thoughts toward {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}, whatever your motive! She is downfall. She is hunger. She is the enemy of all that is good in the universe, She is an enemy to the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, and, I hope, to you as well." {n}Yrliet stresses the last words, looking at you inquisitively.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Ирлиэт темнеет.{/n} "К чему этот вопрос? Праздное любопытство? Или нечто иное? Не обращай свои мысли к {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Сай'лантреш{/g}, что бы тобой ни двигало! Она — погибель. Она — голод. Она — враг всего благого, что есть во вселенной. Она враг {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарам{/g}. И тебе — надеюсь — тоже". {n}Последнюю фразу Ирлиэт произносит с нажимом, испытующе глядя на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow dark.{/n} "Why ask this question? Is it idle curiosity, or something else? Do not turn your thoughts toward Sai'lanthresh whatever your motive! She is downfall. She is hunger. She is the enemy of all good that exists in the universe, She is an enemy to the Aeldari, and to you — or so I hope." {n}Yrliet stresses the last words, looking at you inquisitively.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特的眼神变得阴暗。{/n}“为什么要问这个问题？是因为闲来无事的好奇心，还是别的原因？不管出于什么动机，都千万不要打听任何与{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}赛·兰斯雷什{/g}有关的事情！她是堕落与饥渴本身，她是宇宙中一切美好事物的敌人。她是{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的敌人，我希望她也会是你的敌人。”{n}伊莉耶特着重地强调着最后一句话，以探询的眼神看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow dark.{/n} "Why ask this question? Is it idle curiosity, or something else? Do not turn your thoughts toward {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}, whatever your motive! She is downfall. She is hunger. She is the enemy of all that is good in the universe, She is an enemy to the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, and, I hope, to you as well." {n}Yrliet stresses the last words, looking at you inquisitively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特的眼神变得阴暗。{/n}“为什么要问这个问题？是因为闲来无事的好奇心，还是别的原因？不管出于什么动机，都千万不要打听任何与{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}赛·兰斯雷什{/g}有关的事情！她是堕落与饥渴本身，她是宇宙中一切美好事物的敌人。她是{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的敌人，我希望她也会是你的敌人。”{n}伊莉耶特着重地强调着最后一句话，以探询的眼神看着你。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow dark.{/n} "Why ask this question? Is it idle curiosity, or something else? Do not turn your thoughts toward Sai'lanthresh, whatever your motive! She is downfall. She is hunger. She is the enemy of all that is good in the universe, She is an enemy to the Aeldari, and, I hope, to you as well." {n}Yrliet stresses the last words, looking at you inquisitively.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Yrliet se oscurecen.{/n} «¿Por qué haces esa pregunta? ¿Es solo curiosidad repentina o es algo más? ¡No acerques tus pensamientos a {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}, sin importar los motivos! Es la caída. Es el hambre. Es el enemigo de todo lo que es bueno en el universo. Es el enemigo de los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, y espero que el tuyo también». {n}Yrliet hace énfasis en las últimas palabras mientras te escudriña con la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow dark.{/n} "Why ask this question? Is it idle curiosity, or something else? Do not turn your thoughts toward {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}, whatever your motive! She is downfall. She is hunger. She is the enemy of all that is good in the universe, She is an enemy to the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, and, I hope, to you as well." {n}Yrliet stresses the last words, looking at you inquisitively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Yrliet se oscurecen.{/n} «¿Por qué haces esa pregunta? ¿Es solo curiosidad repentina o es algo más? ¡No acerques tus pensamientos a {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}, sin importar los motivos! Es la caída. Es el hambre. Es el enemigo de todo lo que es bueno en el universo. Es el enemigo de los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, y espero que el tuyo también». {n}Yrliet hace énfasis en las últimas palabras mientras te escudriña con la mirada.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの目が暗くなる。{/n}「なぜこのような質問をする？単なる好奇心か、それとも別の何かか？動機が何であれ、{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}セランスレッシュ{/g}に思考を向けてはならない！彼女は破滅だ。彼女は飢えだ。彼女は宇宙の善なるものの敵であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}の敵である。そして願わくば、お前の敵でもあってもらいたい」{n}ユリエットは最後の言葉を強調し、探るようにお前を見た。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow dark.{/n} "Why ask this question? Is it idle curiosity, or something else? Do not turn your thoughts toward {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}, whatever your motive! She is downfall. She is hunger. She is the enemy of all that is good in the universe, She is an enemy to the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, and, I hope, to you as well." {n}Yrliet stresses the last words, looking at you inquisitively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの目が暗くなる。{/n}「なぜこのような質問をする？単なる好奇心か、それとも別の何かか？動機が何であれ、{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}セランスレッシュ{/g}に思考を向けてはならない！彼女は破滅だ。彼女は飢えだ。彼女は宇宙の善なるものの敵であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}の敵である。そして願わくば、お前の敵でもあってもらいたい」{n}ユリエットは最後の言葉を強調し、探るようにお前を見た。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Blick verdüstert sich.{/n} "Warum fragt Ihr das? Ist es bloße Neugier oder etwas anderes? Richtet Eure Gedanken nicht auf {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}, was auch Eure Beweggründe sein mögen! Sie ist der Niedergang. Sie ist der Hunger. Sie ist der Feind alles Guten im Universum, sie ist ein Feind der {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, und ich hoffe, sie ist auch Euer Feind." {n}Yrliet betont die letzten Worte und blickt dich dabei prüfend an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow dark.{/n} "Why ask this question? Is it idle curiosity, or something else? Do not turn your thoughts toward {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}, whatever your motive! She is downfall. She is hunger. She is the enemy of all that is good in the universe, She is an enemy to the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, and, I hope, to you as well." {n}Yrliet stresses the last words, looking at you inquisitively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets Blick verdüstert sich.{/n} "Warum fragt Ihr das? Ist es bloße Neugier oder etwas anderes? Richtet Eure Gedanken nicht auf {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}, was auch Eure Beweggründe sein mögen! Sie ist der Niedergang. Sie ist der Hunger. Sie ist der Feind alles Guten im Universum, sie ist ein Feind der {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, und ich hoffe, sie ist auch Euer Feind." {n}Yrliet betont die letzten Worte und blickt dich dabei prüfend an.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le regard d'Yrliet s'assombrit.{/n} « Pourquoi cette question ? Est-ce simplement de la curiosité ou un autre genre d'intérêt ? N'invitez pas {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} dans vos pensées, quel que soit votre but ! Elle incarne la ruine, la faim insatiable. Elle est l'ennemie de tout ce qui est bon dans l'univers, des {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g} et, je l'espère, de vous également. » {n}Yrliet insiste sur ces derniers mots en vous lançant un regard inquisiteur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow dark.{/n} "Why ask this question? Is it idle curiosity, or something else? Do not turn your thoughts toward {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}, whatever your motive! She is downfall. She is hunger. She is the enemy of all that is good in the universe, She is an enemy to the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, and, I hope, to you as well." {n}Yrliet stresses the last words, looking at you inquisitively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard d'Yrliet s'assombrit.{/n} « Pourquoi cette question ? Est-ce simplement de la curiosité ou un autre genre d'intérêt ? N'invitez pas {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} dans vos pensées, quel que soit votre but ! Elle incarne la ruine, la faim insatiable. Elle est l'ennemie de tout ce qui est bon dans l'univers, des {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g} et, je l'espère, de vous également. » {n}Yrliet insiste sur ces derniers mots en vous lançant un regard inquisiteur.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in gözlerine karanlık bir ifade çöküyor.{/n} "Bu soruyu neden soruyorsun? Boş meraktan mı yoksa altında başka bir şey mi yatıyor? Niyetin ne olursa olsun düşüncelerin {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh'e{/g} yoğunlaşmasın! O, çöküştür. Açlıktır. Evrendeki tüm iyiliğin düşmanıdır. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldarilerin{/g} düşmanıdır, umuyorum senin de düşmanındır." {n}Son kelimeler, Yrliet'in ağzından gerginlikle dökülüyor. Sana kuşkuyla bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow dark.{/n} "Why ask this question? Is it idle curiosity, or something else? Do not turn your thoughts toward {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}, whatever your motive! She is downfall. She is hunger. She is the enemy of all that is good in the universe, She is an enemy to the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, and, I hope, to you as well." {n}Yrliet stresses the last words, looking at you inquisitively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in gözlerine karanlık bir ifade çöküyor.{/n} "Bu soruyu neden soruyorsun? Boş meraktan mı yoksa altında başka bir şey mi yatıyor? Niyetin ne olursa olsun düşüncelerin {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}'e yoğunlaşmasın! O, çöküştür. O, açlıktır. Evrendeki tüm iyiliğin düşmanıdır. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}lerin düşmanıdır ve umuyorum ki senin de düşmanındır." {n}Son kelimeler, Yrliet'in ağzından gerginlikle dökülüyor. Sana kuşkuyla bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
